de.slothsoft.charts.common

Class Axis

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.slothsoft.charts.common.Axis
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChartPart, Drawable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    XAxis, XYAxis, YAxis

    public abstract class Axis
extends Object
implements ChartPart
    The X or Y axis of a Chart. You have the following methods to implement this abstract class:
    • paintHorizontalAxis(GraphicContext, double, double, double)
    • paintVerticalAxis(GraphicContext, double, double, double)
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Stef Schulz

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Axis()
      Creates an axis using no converters for the coordinates.
      Axis(DoubleUnaryOperator chartXConverter, DoubleUnaryOperator chartYConverter)
      Creates an axis using converters for the coordinates.

        Creates an axis using converters for the coordinates.
        Parameters:
        chartXConverter - converter for graph x to chart x
        chartYConverter - converter for graph y to chart y
